title: 155 12 "The Forbidden Sacred Ground! The Island Where God Lives and Heaven's Judgement!"Transliteration: "Kindan no seichi! Kami no sumi shima to ten no sabaki!" (Japanese:禁断の聖地!神の住む島と天の裁き!) Hidehiko Kadota Michiru Shimada May 18, 2003(2003-05-18)[321] December 22, 2007[322]
